# fetchHistory(after:)

**Type Method**

Retrieves the request history after a given token.

## Declaration

```swift
class func fetchHistory(after token: NSPersistentHistoryToken?) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **token**: The bookmark that defines the start of the request history.

## Return Value

A persistent history fetch request ([doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest]) with an initial token bookmark boundary.

## Fetching History

- **fetchHistory(after:)**: Retrieves history since a given date.
- **fetchHistory(after:)**: Retrieves history since a given transaction.
- **fetchHistory(withFetch:)**: Retrieves history based on a fetch request.
